name: PiscoFacts
0:
”Alexa open pisco facts”
”Alexa ask pisco facts for a fact”
”Alexa tell pisco facts to tell me trivia”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: pisco facts
des:
Ask for Pisco Facts and learn about the national spirit of Peru.

Pisco Facts provides insightful information about this very popular spirit and encourage you to try one of the famous cocktails prepared with it like Pisco Punch or Chilcano.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch Pisco Facts" or "Alexa, open Pisco Facts" to get a fact".

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop".
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
